thread.title: City snapshot: Nestlé sales disappoint in the third quarter
thread.title_full: City snapshot: Nestlé sales disappoint in the third quarter

title: City snapshot: Nestlé sales disappoint in the third quarter
text:
16 Oct 2015 | By Edward Devlin 
Nestlé has reported disappointing third quarter figures as the withdrawal of its Maggi noodles in India and a slower-than-expected recovery in China took their toll. Available to members only
